heading: HR00060
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT A HEARING, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE NECESSITY OF GRANTING A SUBSIDIZED PRICE OF LPG TO URBAN POOR HOUSEHOLDS AND ON THE PROPRIETY OF DIRECTING THE DEPARTMENT OF ENERGY TO ENCOURAGE THE REVIVAL OF THE LIQUEFIED PETROLEUM GAS INSTITUTE OF THE PHILIPPINES (LPGIP) TO POLICE THE RANKS OF LPG DEALERS
status: Pending with the Committee on ENERGY since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00060
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT A HEARING, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE NECESSITY OF GRANTING A SUBSIDIZED PRICE OF LPG TO URBAN POOR HOUSEHOLDS AND ON THE PROPRIETY OF DIRECTING THE DEPARTMENT OF ENERGY TO ENCOURAGE THE REVIVAL OF THE LIQUEFIED PETROLEUM GAS INSTITUTE OF THE PHILIPPINES (LPGIP) TO POLICE THE RANKS OF LPG DEALERS
